verifyUser: select id_user_web from user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyBlock: SELECT bl_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyAttempts: SELECT at_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
selectPassUser: SELECT pa_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
restoreIntentos: UPDATE user_web SET at_user_web = 3 WHERE us_user_web = $1
disminuirIntentos: UPDATE user_web SET at_user_web = at_user_web - 1 WHERE us_user_web = $1
verifyIntentos: SELECT at_user_web FROM user_web WHERE us_user_web = $1
bloquear: UPDATE user_web SET bl_user_web = true, at_user_web = 0 WHERE us_user_web = $1
getDataSession: SELECT uw.id_user_web, uw.us_user_web, uw.em_user_web FROM user_web uw WHERE uw.us_user_web = $1
obtenerPermisos: SELECT p.de_profile profile, m.na_method method, o.na_object object, mo.na_module module FROM security.permission pe INNER JOIN security.profile p ON p.id_profile = pe.id_profile INNER JOIN security.method m ON m.id_method = pe.id_method INNER JOIN security.object o ON o.id_object = m.id_object INNER JOIN security.module mo ON mo.id_module = o.id_module
addUser: INSERT INTO security.user (na_user, pw_user, ma_user, im_user, id_person, id_status_user) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6) RETURNING id_user
seeUser: SELECT na_user as user, ma_user as email FROM security.user WHERE user = $1
verifyMethod: SELECT m.id_method, m.na_method FROM security.method m INNER JOIN security.object o ON m.id_object = o.id_object INNER JOIN security.module mo ON mo.id_module = o.id_module WHERE mo.na_module =$1 AND o.na_object = $2 AND m.na_method = $3
verifyProfile: SELECT id_profile FROM security.profile WHERE de_profile = $1
removePermission: DELETE from security.permission WHERE id_method = $1 AND id_profile = $2
getProfiles: SELECT p.na_profile FROM user_profile up INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = up.id_user_web INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.na_user = $1
hasProfile: SELECT p.id_profile FROM user_profile up INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = up.id_user_web INNER JOIN profile p ON p.id_profile = up.id_profile WHERE uw.na_user = $1 AND p.na_profile = $2
setProfileUser: INSERT INTO user_profile (id_user_web, id_profile) VALUES ((SELECT id_user_web FROM user_web WHERE na_user = $1),(SELECT id_profile FROM profile WHERE na_profile = $2))
setQuestionUser: INSERT INTO question (de_question, an_question, id_user_web) VALUES ($1, $2, (SELECT id_user_web FROM user_web WHERE na_user = $3))
cargarTodasPreguntas: SELECT id_question idQuestion,de_question question FROM question q INNER JOIN user_web uw ON uw.id_user_web = q.id_user_web WHERE uw.na_user = $1
obtenerDosRespuestas: SELECT an_question answer FROM question WHERE id_question IN ($1,$2)
updatePassword: UPDATE user_web SET pa_user_web = $1 WHERE na_user = $2
getMail: SELECT em_user_web FROM user_web WHERE na_user = $1
desbloquear: UPDATE user_web SET bl_user_web = false, at_user = 3 WHERE na_user = $1
